name: Toronto Reflections
description: See and photograph some of the hidden and unique architecture and architectural details of Toronto's downtown core.  This walking tour provides lots of time for photography with introductory comments at each location with some suggestions on taking the best photograph.  Don't worry, the suggestions for photography will not contain dizzying reams of technical information nor will it condescend - it will respect your needs and experience as a photographer!  Even if you don't take a photograph this tour will show you some of the best the City has to offer but few tourists have an opportunity to enjoy.
